6d154e5a7f82ac0b03e5d18e85d9e3a4f68b6f1f.query:
INSERT INTO performance_metrics (
                timestamp, cpu_usage, memory_usage, api_requests_per_sec,
                api_error_rate, avg_response_time, active_connections
            )
            VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8)

2b8c7f4e3d9a1c5f6e8b2a4d7c9e1f3b5a8c6e9d.query: SELECT DISTINCT component FROM performance_metrics WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
